plot: After getting tickets for the ferry headed to Ba Sing Se, the gang meets an old friend. They skip the ride to help refugees get to Ba Sing Se. They must lead the refugees through the Serpent's Pass, a dangerous mountain-side path.

After getting tickets for the ferry headed to Ba Sing Se, the gang meets an old friend. They skip the ferry ride to help some refugees, one of which is going to have a baby, get to Ba Sing Se. They must lead the refugees through the Serpent's Pass, a dangerous mountain-side path surrounded by water.—Michael
